snippet: A teacher at a Catholic school in St. Louis was fired after announcing he was going to marry his longtime partner. But the couple went ahead with their plans and married on Friday in Central Park.
abstract: A teacher at a Catholic school in St. Louis was fired after announcing he was going to marry his longtime partner. But the couple went ahead with their plans and married on Friday in Central Park.

headline.main: When Love Conquers All, Even the Loss of Two Jobs
headline.print_headline: When Love Conquers All, Even the Loss Of Two Jobs
